words.source: H6258 ('attah, adverb with conjunctive waw) 'now/therefore'; KJV 'Come now therefore', ESV 'Come', NASB 'Now'
H3212 (yalak, Qal imperative 2ms with directional he suffix) 'go/come'; KJV 'come now', ESV 'come', NASB 'come'
H7971 (shalach, waw + Qal imperfect 1cs + 2ms suffix) 'to send'; KJV 'I will send thee', ESV 'I will send you', NASB 'I will send you'
H3318 (yatsa', waw + Hiphil imperative 2ms) 'to bring out'; KJV 'that thou mayest bring forth', ESV 'that you may bring', NASB 'so that you may bring'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H5971 ('am, noun common ms construct + 1cs suffix) 'my people'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'my people'
H1121 (ben, noun common mp construct) 'sons/children'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H4714 (Mitsrayim, proper noun with preposition min) 'from/out of Egypt'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'out of Egypt'
